title: 'Civilizational Erasure': Trump Says Europe Risks Being Wiped Away Unless It Changes
description: The White House said Europe risks “civilizational erasure” as a result of decades of economic decline, political censorship and immigration, according to a new national security document that amounts to another sharp Trump administration broadside against the…
